languages.text: "Неправда. Я верен Империуму — Империуму Человечества, Империуму {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Я готов сражаться с тьмой среди звезд и служить {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g} слугам ради торжества Его замысла. Но я не верю, что Империум нуждается в кучке надменных дворян больше, чем в нас — честных тружениках и воинах".

traits.locale_text: "Неправда. Я верен Империуму — Империуму Человека, Империуму {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Я готов сражаться с тьмой среди звезд и служить {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g} слугам ради торжества Его замысла. Но я не верю, что Империум нуждается в кучке надменных дворян больше, чем в нас — честных тружениках и воинах".

languages.text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."
languages.original_text: "Неправда. Я верен Империуму — Империуму Человечества, Империуму {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Я готов сражаться с тьмой среди звезд и служить {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Его{/g} слугам ради торжества Его замысла. Но я не верю, что Империум нуждается в кучке надменных дворян больше, чем в нас — честных тружениках и воинах".

traits.locale_text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the starts and serve {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us, honest workers and warriors."

"That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the starts and serve {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us, honest workers and warriors."

"That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."

languages.text: "Das ist nicht wahr. Ich bin dem Imperium treu ergeben — dem Imperium der Menschheit, dem Imperium des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}. Ich bin bereit, gegen die Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen zu kämpfen und den Dienern des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} zu dienen, damit seine Pläne sich verwirklichen. Doch ich weigere mich zu glauben, dass das Imperium einen Haufen arroganter Adliger dringender benötigt als uns, ehrlich Arbeiter und Krieger."
languages.original_text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist nicht wahr. Ich bin dem Imperium treu ergeben — dem Imperium der Menschheit, dem Imperium des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}. Ich bin bereit, gegen die Dunkelheit zwischen den Sternen zu kämpfen und den Dienern des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} zu dienen, damit seine Pläne sich verwirklichen. Doch ich weigere mich zu glauben, dass das Imperium einen Haufen arroganter Adliger dringender benötigt als uns, ehrlich Arbeiter und Krieger."

languages.text: « C'est faux. Je reste fidèle à l'Imperium... celui de l'humanité, celui du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. Je suis prêt à combattre l'obscurité qui règne parmi les étoiles et aider {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ses{/g} serviteurs, que Son dessein puisse triompher. En revanche, je refuse de croire que l'Imperium a davantage besoin d'une bande de noblions arrogants que de nous autres, honnêtes soldats et travailleurs. »
languages.original_text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."

traits.locale_text: « C'est faux. Je reste fidèle à l'Imperium... celui de l'humanité, celui du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. Je suis prêt à combattre l'obscurité qui règne parmi les étoiles et aider {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Ses{/g} serviteurs, que Son dessein puisse triompher. En revanche, je refuse de croire que l'Imperium a davantage besoin d'une bande de noblions arrogants que de nous autres, honnêtes soldats et travailleurs. »

languages.text: “我没有。我忠于帝国，我忠于人类的帝国，{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的帝国。我时刻准备着，在群星之间与黑暗作斗争，援助{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的仆人，实现祂的计划。我不相信，比起我们这些诚实的工人与战士，帝国会更需要一群傲慢的贵族。”
languages.original_text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."

traits.locale_text: “我没有。我忠于帝国，我忠于人类的帝国，{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的帝国。我时刻准备着，在群星之间与黑暗作斗争，援助{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}的仆人，实现祂的计划。我不相信，比起我们这些诚实的工人与战士，帝国会更需要一群傲慢的贵族。”

languages.text: 「そんなことありません。私は帝国に忠誠を誓っています。人類の帝国、帝国の{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に。私には星々の間の闇と戦い、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}陛下の{/g}しもべらを助ける備えがあります。しかし、帝国が誠実な労働者であり戦士である我々よりも、傲慢な貴族どもを必要としているとは思えません」
languages.original_text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことはない。私は帝国に忠誠を誓っている。人類帝国、帝国の{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}に。私には星々の間の闇と戦い、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}陛下の{/g}しもべらを助ける備えがある。しかし、帝国が誠実な労働者であり戦士である我々よりも、傲慢な貴族どもを必要としているとは思わない」

languages.text: «Eso no es cierto. Soy leal al Imperium. Al Imperium del Hombre, al Imperium del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. Estoy listo para combatir la oscuridad entre las estrellas y ayudar a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Sus{/g} siervos, para que triunfe Su designio. Pero me niego a creer que el Imperium necesite más a un puñado de nobles arrogantes que a nosotros, trabajadores y guerreros honrados».
languages.original_text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."

traits.locale_text: «Eso no es cierto. Soy leal al Imperium. Al Imperium del Hombre, al Imperium del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. Estoy listo para combatir la oscuridad entre las estrellas y ayudar a {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Sus{/g} siervos, para que triunfe Su designio. Pero me niego a creer que el Imperium necesite más a un puñado de nobles arrogantes que a nosotros, trabajadores y guerreros honrados».

languages.text: "Hiç de bile. İmparatorluk'a, İnsan İmparatorluğu'na, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} İmparatorluğu'na sadığım ben. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O'nun{/g} ulvi tasarısının zafere ulaşması için yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıkla savaşmaya ve kullarına yardım etmeye hazırım. Lakin İmparatorluk'un bir avuç kibirli soyluya, biz dürüst işçi ve savaşçılardan daha fazla ihtiyacı olduğuna kimse inandıramaz beni."
languages.original_text: "That's not true. I am loyal to the Imperium — the Imperium of Man, the Imperium of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. I am ready to fight the darkness among the stars and aid {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}His{/g} servants, so that His design may triumph. But I refuse to believe that the Imperium needs a bunch of arrogant nobles more than us honest workers and warriors."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç de bile. İmparatorluk'a, İnsan İmparatorluğu'na, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} İmparatorluğu'na sadığım. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}O{/g}'nun gazasının başarıya ulaşması için yıldızlar arasındaki karanlıkla savaşmaya ve kullarına yardım etmeye razıyım. Lakin İmparatorluk'un bir avuç kibirli soyluya, biz dürüst işçilerden ve savaşçılardan daha fazla ihtiyacı olduğuna inanmayı reddediyorum."
